ingredients: 1 lb. boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into large chunks
1 (3 inch) piece of ginger, roughly chopped
1 dried chili, seeds removed for less spicy heat
4 tsp. Star Butter Flavored Olive Oil
4 tsp. Star Butter Flavored Olive Oil
1 (15 oz.) can fire roasted diced tomatoes, pureed
¼ cup soy or coconut creamer or fat-free half and half
